p_1: Busy life, fast-paced work, annoying emotions, worrisome existence.
p_2: Countless choices, countless confusions, and helplessness lie before us.
p_3: All you need to do is silently contemplate your question and click the button below to obtain a simple answer and hint.
p_5_1: Do you want to confess your feelings?
p_5_2: Should you tell your colleague when they make a fool of themselves?
p_5_6: And you will get the answer.
